name: NYU Hindu Center
tagline: Spiritual and Social Center for the Hindu Community at NYU
body:
# Hari Om

---
There will be a Saraswati Puja this Saturday, 10 December, 2016, from 3 - 5 pm. Those of you facing exams should avail yourselves of the help of the Goddess.
---

### Join Us!

Come join the Hindu Community at the first Hindu Center at New York
University.

Community members are encouraged to come too. You don't have to be a
student, or affiliated with NYU to attend.

Community involvement is important in order to support the students, and have continuity in the Center since students will come and go.

A short puja will be held every Saturday afternoon from 3-5 PM. Major holidays will be observed too.

Get involved so we can all benefit.
This can be the beginning of a permanent Hindu Center at NYU for all to use.
While there, sign our mailing list, and if you like, we will keep you informed of coming events at the center.

# Note: Please bring photo ID

You will have to log in at the front desk. Please bring some photo ID, and tell the guards you're here for the Hindu Center.

---
## Address  
NYU Hindu Center  
Global Center for Academic & Spiritual Life,  
238 Thompson Street, Room 461,  
New York, NY 10011
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
